intro.title: 1. Service Introduction
intro.content: Upvy (hereinafter referred to as "Service") is a short-form learning platform with the slogan "Turn Scroll Time into Growth Time". Users can naturally gain new knowledge and insights while scrolling through fun content.

usage.title: 2. Service Usage
usage.intro: By agreeing to these terms, you agree to the following:
items: Only users aged 14 and above can use the service
Create an account through social login (Google, Naver, Kakao)
Provide accurate information and maintain account security
Not infringe on others' rights or engage in illegal activities

content.title: 3. Content and Copyright
content.userContent: User-uploaded content: Users retain copyright to their uploaded content and grant Upvy a non-exclusive license to use, distribute, and modify such content.
content.aiContent: AI-generated content: To secure initial content, we edit YouTube CC license videos with AI. All content clearly indicates the original author's source.

prohibited.title: 4. Prohibited Activities
items: Infringement of copyrights, trademarks, or other intellectual property rights
Disrupting service operations or attempting system hacking
Indiscriminate posting of spam or advertising content

changes.title: 5. Service Changes and Suspension
changes.content: Upvy may change, suspend, or terminate part or all of the service without prior notice. However, important changes will be announced at least 30 days in advance.

disclaimer.title: 6. Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: Upvy provides the service "as is" and does not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of the service. We are not responsible for damages resulting from service use.

termination.title: 7. Account Termination
termination.content: Users can delete their account at any time. All data is irreversibly deleted upon account deletion. Upvy may suspend or delete accounts without prior notice for violations of the terms.

modifications.title: 8. Terms Modifications
modifications.content: These terms may be changed as necessary, and changes will be announced through in-service notifications. If you do not agree with the modified terms, you must discontinue service use.

jurisdiction.title: 9. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
jurisdiction.content: These terms shall be governed by the laws of the Republic of Korea, and disputes related to service use shall be subject to the jurisdiction of Korean courts.

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.content: For inquiries about the Terms of Service, please contact us through GitHub Issues or Settings > Help & Support.

collection.title: 1. Personal Information Collection
collection.intro: Upvy collects the following information through social login (OAuth 2.0):
items: Service usage records (content views, likes, comments, saves)
Device information (OS version, app version, device identifier)

purpose.title: 2. Purpose of Personal Information Use
purpose.intro: Collected information is used only for the following purposes:
items: Service provision and personalized content recommendations
Service improvement and new feature development
Prevention of fraudulent use and service security

retention.title: 3. Personal Information Retention Period
retention.note: Upon account deletion, all personal information is immediately deleted and not retained except as required by law.

thirdParty.title: 4. Third-Party Provision of Personal Information
thirdParty.intro: Upvy does not provide personal information to third parties without user consent, except in the following cases:
items: When requested for investigative purposes according to legal procedures
When necessary for service provision (infrastructure providers such as AWS, Kafka)

oauth.title: 5. OAuth Social Login
oauth.intro: Upvy does not store passwords and uses OAuth 2.0 protocol from Google, Naver, and Kakao.
oauth.naver: Naver: Email address, nickname, profile picture
oauth.kakao: Kakao: Email address, nickname, profile picture
oauth.note: Each social login provider's privacy policy follows their respective service policies.

cookies.title: 6. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.jwt: JWT tokens: Maintain login status (Access Token 1 hour, Refresh Token 14 days)
cookies.storage: Local storage: App settings and cache data
cookies.tracking: Behavioral tracking: Viewing pattern analysis for content recommendations (anonymized)

children.title: 7. Protection of Children's Personal Information
children.content: Upvy does not collect personal information from children under 14. If parents or guardians believe their child has provided personal information, please contact us immediately.

rights.title: 8. User Rights
rights.intro: Users can exercise the following rights:
rights.stop: Processing suspension: Request account temporary suspension

security.title: 9. Security
security.intro: Upvy takes the following measures to securely protect personal information:
items: Password bcrypt hashing (no password storage with OAuth use)

policyChanges.title: 10. Policy Changes
policyChanges.content: This Privacy Policy may be modified according to laws or service changes. Important changes will be announced through in-service notifications at least 30 days in advance.

contactInfo.title: 11. Contact
contactInfo.intro: For inquiries related to privacy protection:

helpSupport.title: Help & Support
helpSupport.intro: Need help using Upvy? Check out the FAQ and main features guide.

smartFeed.title: Smart Feed
smartFeed.description: Learn naturally by swiping through personalized short-form content. AI recommendation algorithm provides content matching your interests.

search.title: Content Search
search.description: Find desired content by keyword, creator, or category. Various topics including academics, business, and self-development are available.

upload.title: Content Creation
upload.description: Anyone can become a creator. Upload videos or images and share your knowledge.

social.title: Social Features
social.description: Communicate with other users through likes, comments, saves, and shares, and follow creators of interest.

q1.question: Q. What is Upvy?
q1.answer: Upvy is a short-form learning platform that "turns scroll time into growth time". You can naturally gain new knowledge and insights while enjoying content.

q2.question: Q. How do I sign up?
q2.answer: You can easily sign in with your Google, Naver, or Kakao account. No separate password setup required.

q3.question: Q. Is content free?
q3.answer: Yes, all content is currently available for free. Premium content may be added in the future.

q4.question: Q. How do I upload content?
q4.answer: Select the upload tab (+) at the bottom to upload videos or images. Supports videos up to 500MB and 1 minute in length.

q5.question: Q. What is AI-generated content?
q5.answer: To secure initial content, we edit YouTube CC license videos with AI. All content clearly indicates the original author's source.

q6.question: Q. How does the recommendation algorithm work?
q6.answer: Analyzes behavioral data such as viewing history, likes, and saves to recommend personalized content. Provided in ratios of popular content (30%), new content (20%), random (10%), and personalized (40%).

q7.question: Q. I want to delete my account
q7.answer: You can delete your account at Settings > Account Deletion. Deleted data cannot be recovered, so please decide carefully.

values.label: Respect
